form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: SUMMARY TRANSLATION OF THE MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE, NARA 6/15/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA 6/15/2023 SUMMARY TRANSLATION OF THE MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE HUSBAND'S NAME : PEDRO ANTONIO CACERES ROJAS AGE OR DATE OF BIRTH : PLACE OF BIRTH : FATHER'S NAME : MOTHER'S NAME : WIFE'S NAME : CONCEPCION TORUNO VASQUEZ AGE OR DATE OF BIRTH : PLACE OF BIRTH : FATHER'S NAME : MOTHER'S NAME : DATE OF MARRIAGE : JULY 12, 1974 PLACE OF MARRIAGE : LEON, LEON, NICARAGUA I Certify that the above is an accurate translation of the relevant information contained in the attached document. I am conversant in both English and Spanish. STATE OF CALIFORNIA symm COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES On MAY 26 1987 before the undersigned, a Notary Public for the STATE OF CALIFOR- NIA Personally appeared B. NAHUE known to me to be the person who se name is subscribed to the within instrument, and acknowledged that he ex- ecuted the same. Idilia Mahue Smith OFFICIAL SEAL ODILIA NAHUE SMITH NOTARY PUBLIC - CALIFORNIA LOS ANGELES COUNTY My comm. expires FEB 1, 1991
